channel.title: Az.Avd on Sander Rozemuller | All about Identity, AVD, Automation, DevOps, Monitoring, Intune and Security
channel.description: Recent content in Az.Avd on Sander Rozemuller | All about Identity, AVD, Automation, DevOps, Monitoring, Intune and Security

item.title: AVD Automation Cocktail – Deploy AVD AzureAD with DevOps and Az.Avd
item.description: Welcome to the AVD Automation Cocktail. In this cocktail series, I will show different AVD deployment strategies and languages. In this cocktail, Santa’s Tree Ride, I will show you how to deploy an AzureAD joined only AVD environment automated with DevOps and the Az.

item.title: How to enable AVD scaling plans automated
item.description: In this article, I explain how to configure AVD scaling plans automated with the Az.Avd module. This is one of the options to save costs on AVD.

item.title: How to deal with AVD session hosts version management
item.description: A Shared Image Gallery is a great way to distribute images over multiple environments. This great feature is also its disadvantage. When using a Shared Image Gallery in combination with several environments with even more host pools you will lose sight fast.

item.title: Launching the first version of Az.Avd WVD PowerShell module
item.description: During my travel the past year in the world of AVD I noticed I’m using the common Az.DesktopVirtualization PowerShell module very often, but there are some limits.
